pages.name: Ranger Operator Red
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:rpm/items/engine_cells#eagle_racer_engine_cell)Eagle Racer Engine Cell$(/l)

pages.title: Ranger Operator Red
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers RPM (2009, TV Series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:rpm/devices/cell_shift_morphers#red_cell_shift_morpher)Red Cell Shift Morpher$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:TBD

pages.name: Ranger Operator Red Shark Attack Mode
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:samurai/items/power_disks#shark_disc)Shark Disk$(/l) and $(l:samurai/arsenal/spin sword)Spin Sword$(/l) in the off hand

pages.title: Ranger Operator Red Shark Attack Mode
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Power Rangers Samurai: Clash Of The Red Rangers (2011, TV Movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:rpm/devices/cell_shift_morphers#red_cell_shift_morpher)Red Cell Shift Morpher$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:TBD
